title: My Curse to Break
description: Three weeks ago...Lizzie returned to the childhood home she ran away from a year earlier to help care for her Alzheimer's sick mother.Two weeks ago...Lizzie died.Now...After nearly being burned at the stake, eaten by a wendigo, and targeted by police and supernatural creatures alike, Lizzie is ready for it all to be over. There's only one problem: she must close the Rift she tore in the Veil. But, to do that, she must first find it, and second... Well, that's another problem: she has no idea how to undo the damage she has wrought!
author: Kima Blaze
